pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Requirements- Python 3.8+- Flit to put Python packages and modules on PyPI- Pydantic for the data parts.## Installation```pip install flitpip install pyformatters-plugins```## Publish the Python Package to PyPI- Increment the version of your package in the `__init__.py` file:```"""An amazing package!"""__version__ = 'x.y.z'```- Publish```flit publish```
